Section.name: About ARTA
Section.description:
Avanthi's Research & Technological Academy, Vizianagaram was established in 2008-09 under the aegis of Avanthi Educational Trust. College is affiliated to JNTU and is approved by AICTE. Also college is recognized by Govt. of Andhra Pradesh.
Avanthi's Research and Technological Academy AP EAPCET Cutoff 2024 is out. The table given below shows the cutoff for Round 1.
